content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position z1)
- Inserter (position a) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position z1

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting items due to missing ingredients
- Ensure you have the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft an item. For example, to craft iron gear wheels, you need iron plates, which must be available in your inventory or produced by a furnace.

### Errors when extracting from entities
- Make sure to check the inventory of the entity you are extracting from to ensure it contains the items you need. If the inventory is empty, extraction will fail.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities that may block placement.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.
